tool_description: An API showing the latest Coronavirus news around the world.
name: Covid-19 News
title: Covid-19 News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description:
Get news about Covid-19 updates from a specific news source.

/news/sydneymorningherald - Sydney Morning Herald(Australia)
/news/timesofindia - The Times of India(India)
/news/telegraph - The Telegraph(UK)
/news/guardian - The Guardian(UK)
/news/independent - Independent(UK)
/news/dailysun - Daily Sun(Bangladesh)
/news/nytimes - New York Times(USA)
/news/wsj - The Wall Street Journal(USA)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-news4.p.rapidapi.com/news/wsj"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-news4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-news4.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-news4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Coronavirus News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return news about about Covid-19 updates from all over the world.
